#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
	short t, r;
	int N, cnt;
	scanf("%hd", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &N);
		cnt = N/7;
		r = N%7;
		switch(r)
		{
			case 0:
				break;
			case 1:
				cnt-=1;
				break;
			case 2:
				cnt-=2;
				break;
			case 3:
				cnt-=3;
				break;
			case 4:
				break;
			case 5:
				cnt-=1;
				break;
			case 6:
				cnt-=2;
				break;
		}
	if(cnt<0)
		printf("%d\n", -1);
	else
		printf("%d\n", cnt*7);	
	}
}
